PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| active blend layer |
| 80 °C |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

Explanation:

* PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) is a property name that refers to the efficiency of converting light into electrical energy in a solar cell.
* active blend layer is a property name that refers to the layer in a solar cell where the active materials are blended together.
* 80 °C is a property name that refers to the temperature at which the active blend layer was spin-coated.
* PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16 are property names that refer to specific types of bulk heterojunction (BHJ) photoactive materials used in the solar cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

Explanation:

* PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) is the only clear material property mentioned in the paragraph.
* active blend layer, 80 °C, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16 are not material properties, but rather describe the process of creating the solar cells.
